name: This Is Good For You
description:
This Is Good For You

By Gareth Haage

This game was created to mimic my experience with doctors and medication at a young age. Often I would have to take medication that would make me feel more ill than the disease I had, to the point where I would actively hate taking my medication. Soon doctors and nurses would have to force it into me. This game is set to my early experiences, before I grew to understand that medication was a necessary evil to improve my health in the long run. The game was made in the effort to actively make the player uncomfortable when forced to take the medication.
